story_20_09000/2401_1001_0100_10:
The PML staff should be able to take over from
here. We can leave Team Break and the stolen
Pokémon to them.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I can’t believe you defeated all these Team Break
crooks on your own...
story_20_09000/2401_1001_0300_10: I...I don’t even know what to say!
story_20_09000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Like I said before, if you hadn’t been keeping
some of them distracted, I might not have been
able to blindside Team Break the way I did.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_0500_10:
It’s really thanks to you that I was able to
round up all these criminals.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Wow, it feels awesome to hear that from
someone like you, Cynthia!
story_20_09000/2401_1001_0700_10:
That reminds me, I didn’t get to ask you about
that whole “Big Sis” thing back there, Acerola...
What was that all about?
story_20_09000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Oh! I think I said it out of habit... Hee hee!
The kids back home at Aether House always
call me that.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Calem sort of reminded me of them, I guess!
The way he was trying his hardest to protect us,
just like the kids always do.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_1000_10:
But you don’t have to worry about us, Calem.
We want to help protect you, too!
story_20_09000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I guess I wasn’t thinking about how the
rest of you felt, was I?
I just rushed in there headlong.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I did the same thing to my friend Shauna once...
I regretted it back then, too, but I obviously
didn’t learn my lesson.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Sorry, Acerola. I should have paid more attention
to how you and the others were feeling.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_1500_10:
You were right there with me, just like a big
sister, and I totally ignored your help.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Yeah! You should really let Big Sis help you out
more often, OK?
story_20_09000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Hmm... It seems you’ve gained some lovely new
friends, Calem. I’ve been thinking about this for
a while now, but after today...
story_20_09000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I’m convinced that you’d do well on
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team, Calem.
It’s perfect for you!
story_20_09000/2401_1001_1900_10: What?! You want Calem to join our team?!
story_20_09000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Remember how I said I had a couple different
reasons for wanting to approach your
team earlier?
story_20_09000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Well, one of those reasons was to see if you’d
help me take out Team Break... But I was also
hoping you might let me join your team.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_2200_10:
There are worse things than having a highly
skilled Trainer from Kalos on your team, right?
story_20_09000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Hee hee! Well, you have one vote from Acerola!
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_20_09000/2401_0302_0100_10:
You’re in...as long as you learn
to lean on the team a little.
story_20_09000/2401_0402_0100_10:
All right. I wouldn’t want Big Sis to get
mad at me.
story_20_09000/2401_0402_0200_10: Hee hee! I sure hope not!
story_20_09000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Well, that’s excellent! I think I’m even more
excited to battle against your team now.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Wait, does that mean...
You’re competing, too, Cynthia?
story_20_09000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I am, as a matter of fact. Best of luck to both
our teams in the finals.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Speaking of which, we should probably start
heading that way before they begin the
opening ceremony without us.
story_20_09000/2401_1001_2900_10: Oof! Hope they didn’t spot me...
story_20_09000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Just as I thought... There seems to be something
bigger going on around here, unlike anything
we’ve seen before...
story_20_09000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Shall we get going? The greatest sync pairs on
Pasio are gathering at the arena, and we should
be among them!
